about_the_game:
Dive into the pixelated universe of Harvester of the Dead, an action-platformer game inspired by Metroidvania!

Discover a dark story where you must explore various environments and seal the great gate of hell.

Along the way, prepare to face fantastic creatures, improve your skills, and become the legendary Harvester of the Dead.

Key Features (Demo Version):

  • Explore the first 2 areas offered in the game (The Mine and the Forest).

  • Venture into the first rift to the underworld that you can find in the game and complete the demo by facing the boss who holds the first key!

  • Switch between platforming phases and intense combat.

  • Face zombies, undead, and other creatures in randomly generated rifts to the underworld.

  • Start your adventure with melee weapons, then use ranged weapons or magical wands that you find or purchase from merchants.

  • Gain experience, level up, and unlock new skills.

  • Customize your character right from the start: appearance and clothing!

  • Help NPCs by completing their quests and earn new equipment, or visit the shop to upgrade your character! (Not all quests in the demo can be completed).

  • Experience an epic atmosphere with a captivating orchestral soundtrack!

Note : You are about to play the demo of a game still in development.
Many things will be improved before the final release.
